row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.SCRIPT.CREATE_XML_FOR_CLOUD_SERVICE
row.description: Create xml configuration File for a new cloud service

row.process:
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML_KEY# ="create_cloud_service_xml" : SET &VARA_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.VARA.CREATE_CLOUD_SERVICE_DESCRIPTOR" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "&UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML_KEY#",1)
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML# = STR_SUB (&UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML#, "$servicename", &UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE_NAME#) : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML# = STR_SUB (&UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML#, "$label", &UC4RB_AZR_LABEL#) : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML# = STR_SUB (&UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML#, "$description", &UC4RB_AZR_DESCRIPTION#) : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML# = STR_SUB (&UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML#, "$location", &UC4RB_AZR_LOCATION#) : SET &UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML# = STR_SUB (&UC4RB_AZR_CONFIG_XML#, "$reversednsfqdn", &UC4RB_AZR_REVERSE_DNS#)
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_FILENAME# = "create-cloud-service" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_XML : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AZR_XML_FILE_PATH# ,,"TOP"
